alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 11 at 11:30AM MDT until July 11 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Heat Advisory, temperatures up to 108 expected. For the Excessive Heat Watch, dangerously hot conditions with temperatures up to 111 possible. * WHERE...Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...For the Heat Advisory, until 8 PM MDT this evening. For the Excessive Heat Watch, from Wednesday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Heat related illnesses increase significantly during extreme heat events.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
